doc:
Matt Letscher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matt_Letscher 0 Matthew Letscher (born June 26, 1970) is an American actor and playwright, known for his roles as Captain Harrison Love in the 1998 American swashbuckler film The Mask of Zorro and as Colonel Adelbert Ames in the 2003 American film Gods and Generals. He co-starred in the 2016 Michael Bay film 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi, playing Ambassador J. Christopher Stevens. He has also portrayed Eobard Thawne / Reverse-Flash in The Flash and Legends of Tomorrow. Matthew_Letscher ( born June_26_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor_and_playwright , known for his_roles as Captain_Harrison_Love in the_1998_American_swashbuckler_film The_Mask of Zorro and as Colonel_Adelbert_Ames in the_2003_American_film_Gods_and_Generals . He co-starred in the_2016_Michael_Bay_film 13_Hours : The_Secret_Soldiers of Benghazi , playing Ambassador_J._Christopher_Stevens . He has_also_portrayed Eobard_Thawne / Reverse-Flash in The_Flash_and_Legends of Tomorrow .
